description: Learn how to make a perfectly crispy skin salmon for your next BBQ or family dinner. The olives, caper and lemon sauce take this recipe to the next level.
name: Salmon With Crispy Olives And Lemon Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small lemons, 1 zested, 1 cut in half
0.25 cup continental parsley leaves, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1/4 cup oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add olives, capers and zest, then cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes or until olives are golden and crispy. Transfer to a bowl. Stir in parsley and season.
Add lemon halves, cut-sides down, to pan. Cook for 5 minutes or until golden and caramelised. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.

Drizzle salmon, skin-side up, with remaining oil. Rub salt into skin. Place salmon, skin-side down, in pan and cook for 4 minutes or until skin is crisp. Flip and cook for a further 2 minutes or until just cooked through. Add olive mixture to pan with vinegar and cook for a further 1 minute. Serve with lemon halves.
